alert.note: Alert for Centre; Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 1:28PM EDT until September 07 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... Central Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 128 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mcalevys Fort, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... State College, Huntingdon, Bellefonte, Park Forest Village, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Lemont, Zion, Belleville, Houserville, Pine Grove Mills and Milroy. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Snow Shoe and Lamar exits, specifically from mile markers 157 to 162. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 70 to 85. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
